name: Vyrka
passiveDesc:
Vyrka has 3 HP bars at the beginning of the battle. When she loses 1 HP bar, she gains 36% DMG Bonus. When Vyrka deals DMG to the opponent, she will recover 40% of that DMG as HP. When dealing DMG greater than 30% of her Max HP, she will gain 1 stack of Fury Shard.

Special Active Skill: When Vyrka has 3 Fury Shards, she can recover 1 of her HP bars.
rTalentDesc: Vyrka's Normal and Charged Attacks generate 1 Flux.
normalAttackDesc: Vyrka deals 40% Physical ATK as Physical DMG to the opponent.
chargedAttackDesc: Vyrka deals 60% Physical ATK as Physical DMG to the opponent.
normalSkillDesc: Vyrka consumes 16% of her Max HP and cleaves through the opponent, dealing 198 (+33% Physical ATK) (+18% Current HP) as Destruction DMG.
riftedSkillDesc: Vyrka consumes an entier HP bar and erupts with a devastating strike, dealing 144 (+27% Physical ATK) (+46% Consumed HP Bar) as True DMG.
fragment1Desc: When Vyrka has only 1 HP bar left, her Physical, Magical and Reaction RES are increased by 36%.
fragment2Desc: Vyrka's Normal Attacks increases her Max HP by 16% for 2 Cycles, max 32%.
fragment4Desc: If Vyrka's HP increases or decreases, her CRIT Rate is increased by 12%. The HP effects will ignore the incoming DMG.
fragment6Desc: Max HP is increased by 20%. Fury Shards can be stacked up to 5 times. When casting her Special Active Skill, the excess amount of Fury Shards will be absorbed into a Shield equals to 200% Vyrka's Physical ATK. The absorbed Fury Shards will explode, each dealing 40% Vyrka's Physical ATK multiplied by 2% Current HP as Destruction DMG.
